Class KafenioMenuBar

java.lang.Object
  de.xeinfach.kafenio.KafenioMenuBar
public class KafenioMenuBar
extends java.lang.Object

Description: class is used to create a Menubar for the Kafenio Editor Applet.

Author:
Karsten Pawlik
